it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
    class that manage the players
    Author:
    Federico Innocente

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(java.lang.String username, Character character)
      Costructor: set the preferences of the player (username, character) and give him one ammoCube for each colour

      • getLoadedWeapons

        public boolean[] getLoadedWeapons()
        Scan the weapons carried and find which of them are loaded
        Returns:
        a boolean array, each element is true if the respectively weapon carried is loaded

      • getCubeColourNumber

        public int getCubeColourNumber(CubeColour colour)
        return the number of cubes, owned by the player, with the same colour as the one passed as parameter
        Parameters:
        colour - is the color of the searched cubes
        Returns:
        amount is the number of cubes of the given color, carried by the player

      • getNumberOfWeapons

        public int getNumberOfWeapons()

      • canAffortCost

        public boolean canAffortCost(AmmoCube[] cost)
        Check if the player could afford a payment that derives from a request
        Parameters:
        cost - is a list of AmmoCubes, that represents the cost
        Returns:
        true if the player can affords the cost, paying with both ammo and powerUp

      • discardWeapon

        public void discardWeapon(Weapon weapon)
        This method handle the discard of a card and notifies the change; it must be invoked only if the player has already drawn his 4th weapon and now need to discard one; is supposed that the player's position coincides with a SpawnSquare because he grabs from there and for what is said before
        Parameters:
        weapon - is the discarded weapon

      • addPoints

        public void addPoints(int pointsToAdd)
        Add the given number of points to the player's points actual value
        Parameters:
        pointsToAdd - is the number of points that will be added

        public void invertDeathState()
        This method invert the dead attribute value

      • getWhileActionPowerUp

        public java.util.ArrayList<PowerUp> getWhileActionPowerUp()
        Search in the player's reserve for each of the PowerUp that has its Usability value as WHILE_ACTION
        Returns:
        an ArrayList that contains all of the PowerUps that satisfy the precedent condition

        public void setDead()
        Set the dead attribute value to true
